description: Erection of single storey rear extension (6.0m in depth, maximum height of 3.35m and eaves height of 2.6m)
decision_conditions: The applicant has not demonstrated beyond balance of probabilities that the proposed extensions together with the existing enlargement(s) of the original dwellinghouse would not extend beyond a wall forming a side elevation of the original dwellinghouse and would not have a width greater than half the width of the original dwellinghouse.  As such the proposed would conflict with Paragraphs A.1 (ja) and  (j) (iii) of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended).In addition, the applicant has not demonstrated beyond balance of probabilities that the extension proposed furthest-most to the rear and measuring 4m in depth, together with the existing enlargement of the original dwellinghouse would not be in conflict with Paragraph A.1 (g) (i) Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015.
Condition 3 - RBK Highways Engineer has reviewed the information submitted and is satisfied this can now be fully discharged.

Inspection:Site inspection carried out as a desktop exercise with information provided by the applicant as supporting material to application.Assessment:The works where permission is needed are acceptable and appropriate in nature in order to manage and maintain the trees in the interests of public health and safety.Recommendation:Approve with a condition for replacment planting of the London Plane.
